mapper.select: SELECT a.att_num, a.emp_num, e.emp_name, a.go_work, a.leave_work, a.break_time, TRUNC((a.leave_work - a.go_work) * 24) work_time FROM attendance a JOIN emp e ON a.emp_num = e.emp_num WHERE a.emp_num = #{emp_num} AND e.emp_num = #{emp_num} ORDER BY go_work DESC

SELECT a.att_num, a.emp_num, e.emp_name, a.go_work, a.leave_work, a.break_time, TRUNC((a.leave_work - a.go_work) * 24) work_time FROM attendance a JOIN emp e ON a.emp_num = e.emp_num where e.emp_num=#{empNum} AND to_char(a.go_work,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #{startDate} AND to_char(a.leave_work,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #{endDate} order by a.go_work desc
